milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.title: 热更新中断，继续更新挂掉
data.body:
断线续传的时候
AssetsManagerEx::startUpdate
->
_tempManifest->genResumeAssetsList(&_downloadUnits);
由于未标记下载完成状态，导致整个列表全部下载。
并且由于目录未创建，导致出错.

好奇的是，既然有把其他未更新资源设置下载完成：
_tempManifest->setAssetDownloadState(key, Manifest::DownloadState::SUCCESSED);
为什么不把它写回文件？

data.title: [AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
[AUTO][ci skip]: updating cocos2dx_files.json
fix iOS EditBox Chinese input maxLength issue.
autorelease() missing in MenuItemToggle
Cannot use --advanced to publish web with certain library such as socketio and underscore
data.body:
Hi,

There is problem when using command below to publish web version.
`cocos compile -p web -m release --advanced`

The website is working without using `--advanced`

When include socketio module, website will return error `Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read property 'push' of undefined`

> "modules": ["cocos2d","socketio"],

The error point to this code `push("websocket")` in game.min.js

There is errors when using underscore.js library too with `--advanced`

In the Closure Compiler FAQ
https://github.com/google/closure-compiler/wiki/FAQ#i-want-to-use-advanced-optimizations-but--jquery-yui-underscore-prototype-js-library-foo--does-not-work-with-them-what-do-i-do

It suggest to use externs file which i found here but i don't know how to pass in.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/google/closure-compiler/master/contrib/externs/underscore-1.4.4.js

How can we pass externs files to the compiler command with `--advanced`?
`cocos compile -p web -m release --advanced`

Thanks.

data.title: Fix bug: timer dt time error when interval = 0.

This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.title: Fix bug: timer dt time error when interval = 0.
[ci skip] Rewrite testcase for stencil depth mask

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
In Web Engine we can't push renderCmd halfway through rendering, therefore, I changed another way to express the effect of stencil depth mask.
- Firstly, the whole scene is rendered.
- When Click the text, depthStencil begin to work and makes the screen black.
- Touch anywhere to disable stencil and back to normal scene.

data.title: Fix bug: timer dt time error when interval = 0.
